Conversion Optimization

Turning traffic into revenue

Strategic Optimization, Measurable Results

Every pixel serves a purpose. I combine behavioral analytics, user research, and systematic A/B testing to identify and remove friction points across your entire conversion funnel.

My approach focuses on understanding user intent and aligning every element—copy, design, UX—toward your business goals. The result? Sustainable improvements that compound over time.

  • Heatmap analysis and session recordings to understand real user behavior
  • Hypothesis-driven A/B and multivariate testing with statistical rigor
  • Landing page optimization focused on intent and action
  • Checkout and form optimization to reduce abandonment
